comment.author: 50064961@N00
comment._content: The caption is incorrect. Although on Santa Fe tracks, it is a photo  a Union Pacific passenger train. The locomotive is a Los Angeles & Salt Lake MT-2 class, 4-8-2. The LA & SL was owned by the UP. From looking at the enlarged TIFF image, the locomotive number is likely  #7850. This engine had the nickname ''Killer'' because three employees were killed while operating it at various times.
